page.title: 13HOUSES IN NORTON STOURBRIDGE
page.content: The average price of a house in Norton is a approximately Â£42,000. There are many different designs of house which take about three or four months to build.Most houses have garages,a driveway and gardens both front and back.Many houses have{double {glazing},a method of keeping heat in and noise out.This is done by using two sheets of glass with an air gap in the middle.The glass becomes harder to break as well.Some of the newer homes are fitted with{burgler alarms}.North of South Road are mainly older terraced houses.South of the road there are mainly semi-detached houses. The latest houses near to Gig Mill School are at Miller's Green and Morning Pines.Such new{housing} contains a lounge,dining room,kitchen, laundry room and four bedrooms.They mostly have gas central heating.
